P

payWithBlueToken() - Method in class Hanabi.Board
When needed (giving a hint by a player), this function decreases the number of blue tokens by one
playAndDraw(Board, int, String) - Method in class Hanabi.Player
Put the card on game if allowed and draw a card from the deck
Player - Class in Hanabi
All variables and methods directly linked to the player
Player(String, Board) - Constructor for class Hanabi.Player
Constructor of Player with a given name.
previousTurn() - Method in class Hanabi.Board
Decreases the turn number by one To be used ONLY when player wanted to give a hint and wasn't able to because of a lack of blue tokens
punishWithRedToken() - Method in class Hanabi.Board
When an error is done (playing the wrong card or in the wrong place), this functions increases the number of red tokens by one
